title: Climate-Activist Countries Fuel Record Year for Green Bonds
text:
When Chilean finance officials hit the road this spring for their annual meetings with bond investors, they took their sales pitch to an unlikely destination: Helsinki.

Chile had never held a Nordic bond roadshow before, but the officials visited the Finnish capital—and cities in Denmark and Sweden—because they were preparing to issue their first so-called green bond.
